segment.source: Start and Stop the AGPM Service
segment.target: Start and Stop the AGPM Service

segment.source: Start and Stop the AGPM Service
segment.target: Start and Stop the AGPM Service

segment.source: Start and Stop the AGPM Service
segment.target: Start and Stop the AGPM Service

segment.source: The AGPM Service is a Windows service that acts as a security proxy, managing client access to Group Policy objects (GPOs) in the archive and production environment.
segment.target: The AGPM Service is a Windows service that acts as a security proxy, managing client access to Group Policy objects (GPOs) in the archive and production environment.

segment.source: Stopping or disabling the AGPM Service will prevent AGPM clients from performing any operations (such as listing or editing GPOs) through the server.
segment.target: Stopping or disabling the AGPM Service will prevent AGPM clients from performing any operations (such as listing or editing GPOs) through the server.

segment.source: A user account with access to the AGPM Server (the computer on which the AGPM Service is installed) is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with access to the AGPM Server (the computer on which the AGPM Service is installed) is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: To start or stop the AGPM Service
segment.target: To start or stop the AGPM Service

segment.source: On the computer on which Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management - Server (and therefore the AGPM Service) is installed, click Start, click Control Panel, click Administrative Tools, and then click Services.
segment.target: On the computer on which Microsoft Advanced Group Policy Management - Server (and therefore the AGPM Service) is installed, click Start, click Control Panel, click Administrative Tools, and then click Services.

segment.source: In the list of services, right-click AGPM Service and select Start, Restart, or Stop.
segment.target: In the list of services, right-click AGPM Service and select Start, Restart, or Stop.

segment.source: Do not modify settings for the AGPM Service through Administrative Tools and Services in the operating system.
segment.target: Do not modify settings for the AGPM Service through Administrative Tools and Services in the operating system.

segment.source: Doing so can prevent the AGPM Service from starting.
segment.target: Doing so can prevent the AGPM Service from starting.

segment.source: To modify settings for the service, see Managing the AGPM Service.
segment.target: To modify settings for the service, see Managing the AGPM Service.
